ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: "Incipit In Medias Res"
ComicInfo.Summary: NEW CRIME FICTION MINI-SERIES SHIPPING BI-WEEKLY! A top-notch creative team from Italy spins a hard-boiled crime fiction tale from the boroughs of NYC! PART ONE: "INCIPIT IN MEDIA RES" In the dead of winter, with a snowstorm looming, a routine homicide investigation has a literary twist. A suspected drug dealer is found dead and naked, with what seems to be part of a larger story written all over his body. Detectives Sam Burke and Twitch Williams, along with graphologist Charlotte Garland, have to discover the truth, but the case, like the weather, can only get worse...
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlotte Garland,Twitch Williams,Monica Starlight,Sam Burke,Jacob Marley,Ralph Woodwind,Roland Freeman
